title: Kao no nai Tsuki (Moonlight Lady)
synopsis: Suzuna is the only daughter of the Kuraki family. She is training hard to become a priestess. Tomomi brings her to the house of her husband-to-be. The mansion is under a strange spell, releasing the sexual desires of everyone inside.
related_anime: ['Kao no nai Tsuki Visual Comic Anthology', 'Touka Gettan', 'Kao no nai Tsuki Comic Collection']
